definition: to turn a hand over/to put one's hand behind one's back/fig. easily done
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: I was impressed with his skills in the backhand smash, the forehand smash, and the drop shot.
sentences.chinese: 霍尔比较喜欢横拍，因为他可以轻易地用反手扣球。

sentences.english: We are practising backhand topspin and backspin serves.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在练习反手推挡。

sentences.english: You like to take the backhand crosscourt and to run around and hit forehands off second serves.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢打反手穿越，大范围跑动然后正手接二发。

sentences.english: By employing the seemingly miraculous backhand painting technique, the art compacts the universe into a small space.
sentences.chinese: 它用神奇的内部反手画法将乾坤融于方寸之间。

sentences.english: The opponent was wrong-footed by his passing backhand.
sentences.chinese: 他的对手被他一记漂亮的反手球打得措手不及。

sentences.english: Six-year-old Gunda Arzhba myelinates her backhand with a Spartak coach.
sentences.chinese: 六岁的阿恣芭在教练的指导下练习反手击球。

sentences.english: Anti- hand kneads bayonet to come over from that hand inside.
sentences.chinese: 反手，从那人手里把匕首捏过来。

sentences.english: She’s tall, muscular, and uses a one-handed backhand.
sentences.chinese: 她身高马大，肌肉健硕，经常使得单手的反手。

sentences.english: It takes me nearly 3 years to have relatively steady forehand and backhand.
sentences.chinese: 我花了将近三年的时间才有了相对稳定的正反手。

sentences.english: I am good at the backhand topspin.
You are learning the backhand topspin and backspin serves.
sentences.chinese: 你在学习发反手上旋球和下旋球。

sentences.english: You can spin it more with a backhand(shot).
sentences.chinese: 你可以打反手拍使旋转更厉害。

sentences.english: Pay attention to his backhand chop.
Ailey immediately hen the backhand a box on the ear, and scold him not revive.
sentences.chinese: 艾莉立即反手打了世贤一耳光，并骂他不够苏醒。

sentences.english: Liu Tao backhand smashes, but the ball is outside.
sentences.chinese: 刘涛反手推杀，但球出界了。

sentences.english: Only his backhand really let him down. But he's working on it.
sentences.chinese: 虽然反手表现稍弱，但是他在努力做得好。

hand formed into a flat shape, as for a karate chop

to select

épée (fencing)
ferocious/fierce/violent/brave/suddenly/abrupt/(slang) awesome
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
kick
to take advantage of a favorable situation/to seize an opportunity
a throwing knife/fly cutter (machine tool)

to batter/combo (hit) (gaming)/(volleyball, table tennis etc) double hit/double contact
